overview: Rodney Pierce is a graduate of Morehouse College and Georgia Institute of Technology. He received a BS in General Science in 1997 from Morehouse College and BS in Industrial Engineering from Georgia Tech in 2000. While working full-time as a Plant Engineer for a Georgia-based company, Mr. Pierce spent his spare time and weekends working in the event marketing and nightlife industries where he helped manage large events for major spirits brands and record labels. During those weekend assignments, Mr. Pierce discovered his passion for event marketing in addition saw an opportunity to deliver more comprehensive services to clients. He established Divine Management LLC, a company that specializes in the development and execution of experiential marketing programs.
